nodes.text: Finn's Mission is a canon DK Readers Level 3 title that retells the adventures of First Order stormtrooper defector Finn during the events of the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It was written by David Fentiman and was published by DK Publishing on June 7, 2016.
The book was reissued as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: Yoda Level 3 box set on December 12, 2017.
Join Finn as he faces the might of the evil First Order in DK Readers L3: Star Wars™: Finn's Mission.

From the desert wastelands of Jakku to the jungles of D'Qar and the frozen mountains of the Starkiller, follow Finn as he bravely battles the First Order. Meet the heroes who will help him in his mission, and face the terrifying enemies who will stand in his way.
